snippet.title: Forma Trailer
snippet.description:
Hunt or be hunted in Forma, an immersive sandbox RPG set in a land overrun by living emotions, where every choice shapes a dynamic living world.

Demo available now - https://store.steampowered.com/app/3353160/Forma/
